template.description: A template to get files from an SFTP server and then submit it to a Predix API
template.name: SFTP to Predix API

entry.value: From ThreadConnect UAT environment: Unable to Retrieve ${file} from sftp.corp.ge.com server for user "roa_sftp_admin" due to either SFTP host not reachable or Authentication problem or file not found.

From ThreadConnect UAT env: Unable to push file ${file} to Predix file store after retrying 3 times for user "roa_sftp_admin". ${file} is available in sftp.ge.corporate.com under prod/archive folder. Place the file in prod\site_files to reprocess.
